definition: (bird species of China) hooded crane (Grus monacha)
surname Bai

white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera

head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]
crane

sentences.english: So the wintering period of Hooded Crane at Chongming Dongtan is about 5 months.
sentences.chinese: 因此，白头鹤在崇明东滩的越冬期约为5个月。

sentences.english: The cranes are building nests now.
The bird census on hooded cranes for this spring has been completed.
sentences.chinese: 今年春季白头鹤种群数量调查外业工作已经结束。

sentences.english: I am at Xinqing Nature Reserve of Hooded Cranes in Lesser Khingan Mountains.
sentences.chinese: 我在小兴安岭新青白头鹤自然保护区。

sentences.english: However, the number on the satellite tracking device was not seen because of long distance.
sentences.chinese: 但是由于距离太远，并没有看到白头鹤的环志号。

sentences.english: Changgou Village in Qiqihaar City, China is the stopover site of Hooded Crane.
sentences.chinese: 齐齐哈尔市铁峰区长沟村是白头鹤南北迁徙的停歇地。
